body_html: FWIW I was seeing this after getting an OOM and then reducing the batch size. The video card seems to hold on to memory after crashes sometimes. Restarting the machine fixed the problem for me.
body_text: FWIW I was seeing this after getting an OOM and then reducing the batch size. The video card seems to hold on to memory after crashes sometimes. Restarting the machine fixed the problem for me.
